title: Create wrangler dev test orchestration
description:
Create scripts to orchestrate wrangler dev for integration testing.

Requirements:
- Script to start wrangler dev in background
- Wait for it to be ready (health check)
- Script to stop wrangler dev
- Handle port conflicts gracefully
- Integrate with vitest setup/teardown

Location: internal/tickboard/ui/e2e/wrangler-helper.sh or similar
acceptance_criteria: wrangler dev can be started/stopped programmatically for tests
closed_reason: Created wrangler-ctl.sh script with start/stop/status commands. Handles port conflicts by trying alternative ports, waits for /health endpoint to be ready, tracks PID and port in state files. Tested start, stop, status, and port conflict scenarios.
